message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we believe its true worth exceeds $12,000 to you. However, considering our business objectives and the market conditions, we propose to sell it to you at an exceptional price of $11,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while ensuring our financial goals are met. We hope you find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your endeavors.
